attributes.action: STOP EASTERN EUROPEANS FROM UNLIMITED ENTRY TO THE UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: CAN YOU STOP THE EASTERN EUROPEANS FROM GAINING UNLIMITED ENTRY TO THE UK. THEY ARE KILLING THIS COUNTRY. I LIVE IN THE SOUTH HOLLAND AREA OF LINCOLNSHIRE AND LIKE MANY OTHER PARTS OF THE COUNTRY THESE PEOPLE ARE COMMITING SO MANY TYPES OF CRIME INCLUDING VERY SERIOUS CRIME. THE POLICE I GUESS ARE AT STRETCHING POINT WITH THEM. THEY ARE NOT WELCOME ANYMORE. ENOUGH IS ENOUGH NOW. IF YOU DONT HALT IT NOW THERE WILL BE RIOTS I AM SURE. ITS NEARLY AT THAT POINT NOW. LOOK AT THE POLL TAX. PEOPLE DID STAND UP TO BE COUNTED. MR BLAIR LET THEM IN.. NOW IF YOU WANT TO STAY IN POWER MR BROWN DO THE SENSIBLE THING AND HALT THEM.. THIS CAN BE DONE EITHER BY ADDRESSING THIS INDIVIDUALLY OR COMING OUT OF EUROPE.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
